title: Kelly Brook reportedly signs up for Celebrity Bake Off
text:
Now we’d love to see Kelly Brook on the show (Picture: Getty; Channel 4)

Kelly Brook might be making an appearance in The Great British Bake Off tent, as the star has reportedly signed up to compete on the show’s celebrity series.

According to the Daily Star the model and radio presenter is one of the first stars to sign up for 2020’s charity edition of the nation’s favourite baking show, which is expected to air in March.

Raising money for Channel 4’s Stand Up 2 Cancer fundraiser, Kelly reportedly jumped at the opportunity to join Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood in the Bake Off tent.

‘The team at Bake Off have been keen to get Kelly on the show for a while because they know how popular she is,’ a source said.

‘Finally the stars have aligned and she was able to sign up. As soon as the dates fitted round her schedule, Kelly agreed straight away.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘She loves the show so much. She watches every series, so the chance to be a contestant will be a real thrill for her.’

Is Kelly Brook heading to the Bake Off tent? (Picture: GC Images)

So could the 39-year-old model be about to make waves in the world of baking? Well, according to her friends she’s a ‘pretty good’ cook, so we have high hopes!

‘Now she knows she’s going to be on Bake Off she’ll be honing her skills so she can be in with a chance of success,’ a source reportedly said, adding: ‘She’s determined to impress the judges.’

Metro.co.uk has contacted Kelly Brook’s representatives in search of comment.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Kelly Brook is reported to be heading for The Great British Bake Off tent, after signing up to compete on the show’s celebrity series.
